message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its unique features and exceptional quality. I believe it's worth more than what others are asking, but I'm willing to start the negotiation at $150. Let me know if this is within your budget or if you'd like to propose a counteroffer.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $120. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
